head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths JOSEPH, MAVIS IONE

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths JOSEPH, MAVIS IONE

block.p: JOSEPH-Mavis Ione. On July 15, 2000. Beloved wife of Stephen H., devoted mother of Janis & John, loving grandmother of Sarah, Michael, Nathan & Joseph. Family will receive friends Monday, 2-5, 79 PM, with services Tuesday, July 18, 11 AM, at Bernheim-ApterGoldsticker Suburban Funeral Chapel, 1600 Springfield Ave., Maplewood, NJ. Contributions in her memory may be made to the Center for Hospice Care, 187 Millburn Ave., Millburn, NJ 07041.
